# registerAction()

**Type Method**

Registers the action into the action-types registry.

## Declaration

```swift
static func registerAction()
```

## Discussion

Registering an action allows RealityKit to retrieve its [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationResource] definitions.

Registering an action may not be necessary, because RealityKit automatically registers the action when you:

- Initialize an [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ActionAnimation] with this action.
- Subscribe to it in any way, including subscribing an [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ActionHandlerProtocol].
